preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 100 g of Neodymium (Nd) using a precision scale. 
 2. Weigh 200 g of Nickel (Ni). 
 3. Weigh 50 g of Phosphorous (P). 
 4. Weigh 10 g of Promethium (Pm). 
 5. In a clean, dry mixing bowl, combine the Nd, Ni, P, and Pm powders thoroughly using a spatula to ensure a homogenous mixture.
